mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (category, title, shareId, sharePw, leaderpNum, startDt, endDt, price, ctnt) VALUES (#{category}, #{title}, #{shareId}, #{sharePw}, #{leaderpNum}, #{startDt}, #{endDt}, #{price}, #{ctnt})
mapper.select: SELECT CEIL(COUNT(boardPk) / #{rowCnt}) FROM t_board WHERE category = #{category} AND isDel = 0
